TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit XPathFollowingMergeIterator extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Iterates over all following nodes according to the XPath following axis rules.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPathFollowingMergeIterator iterates over all following nodes according to XPath following axis rules, merges multiple sets of following nodes in document order, and removes duplicates.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Create(class System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter filter) cil managed

Docs.param: An instance of the class, which enables you to filter nodes based on name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator> merges multiple sets of following nodes in document order and removes duplicates.

## Remarks The Current property changes when the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method sets the Current property to the next node and returns <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult>; otherwise, the Current property remains unchanged.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.IteratorResult MoveNext(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator input) cil managed

Docs.summary: Moves the iterator to the next following node.
Docs.returns: Returns if there are no more following nodes. Returns if the next input node must be fetched first. Returns if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingMergeIterator.Current%2A> property was set to the next node while iterating through the nodes.
